author: Vijaita Singh
title: Coronavirus outbreak | Affected districts increased from 62 to 257 in a span of 15 days
description: In all, there are 718 districts in the country spread over 28 States and eight Union Territories
content:
The total number of districts that reported COVID-19 positive cases across the country jumped from 62 to 257 in a span of 15 days, a presentation made by the Ministry of Health to the Cabinet Secretary said.
